text:
Passage:
The city introduced a weekly car-free hour on major roads to encourage walking and cycling. Local shops reported higher footfall, while residents noted clearer air and a calmer soundscape.

Q: Primary purpose of the measure?
explanation: Answer follows directly from the passage.

text:
Arrange the parts to form a coherent paragraph:
B. Stalls offered regional snacks and handicrafts.
D. The park was decorated with lights and banners.
C. Local musicians performed throughout the day.
A. The festival drew visitors from many cities.
explanation: Logical flow: A (overview) → B (stalls) → C (music) → D (decor).

text:

explanation: Logical flow: A (overview) → B (stalls) → C (music) → D (decor).

text:
No apples are blue. Some fruits are apples.
Which conclusion follows?
options_json: ["Some fruits are not blue.","All fruits are blue.","Some apples are blue.","No fruits are blue."]

text:
All poets are dreamers. Some dreamers are teachers.
Which conclusion follows?
